mapper.select:
select ar.id, ar.note_content, ar.create_time, ar.create_by, ar.edit_time, u2.name edit_by, ar.edit_flag, ar.activity_id from tbl_activity_remark ar
left join tbl_user u2 on ar.edit_by = u2.id where activity_id = #{activityId} order by ar.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity_remark ( id, note_content, create_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by, edit_flag, activity_id ) values ( #{id}, #{noteContent}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{editTime}, #{editBy}, #{editFlag}, #{activityId} )
